title:
**Hello everyone,**

text:
**Hello everyone,**

We are aware of **Guild War not being available to join right now**, despite us all receiving the information that the Preparation Phase was only January 9th until January 16th, and that the mode would officially be in Competition Phase and joinable on January 17th until February 6th. *pictured below*

We have sent additional notices to the proper staff who can look into this! We appreciate your patience,  but can assure you the Moderation Team is making sure these kinds of concerns are mentioned as directly as possible. 

Thank you and we're sorry this is happening too.  :emoji_109:

Please understand the Moderation team are not developers, and are experiencing everything at the same time as you all, and noting these reports to be forwarded ASAP. We noticed it appears to be isolated to Yunya regions (EU & Africa) as of January 17th. We do not know if it will continue to not work tomorrow unfortunately.

GvG Status as of Jan 17th. 
Canglang âœ… 
Yunya :z1_X: 
Yongu âœ…
@Game Updates @Community News
author: armoredsoldiers
